## My First Presentation  
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
x<-rnorm(100)
x
y<-rnorm(100)
y
z=sample(c("M","F"),100,replace = T)
dt=data.frame(x,y,z)
head(dt)
summary(dt)
qplot(x,y,xlab = "X",ylab = "Y",main = "100 Random numbers",col=as.factor(z))

#Plot histogram
```{r echo=F}
hist(x,xlab = "1-random numbers",ylab = "freq",col="blue")
abline(v=median(x),col="red",twd=2)
rug(x)
par(mfrow=c(1,3))
hist(x)
hist(y)
rug(y)

#Bar plot
```{r echo=FALSE}
tab=table(z)
barplot(tab,col = "red")
heatmap(table(x,y))

#heatmap and barplot for iris data set
```{r echo=FALSE}
attach(iris)
heatmap(as.matrix(iris[,-5]))
barplot(table(iris$Species),col = "red")

#Boxplot
```{r echo=FALSE}
boxplot(x,col = "cyan")
